meanings.definition: The practice of raising silkworms for the production of silk.
meanings.sent1: Sericultures involve raising silkworms to make silk.
meanings.sent2: The sericultures in this region have been thriving for generations.
meanings.sent3: The sericultures decided to have a race to see who could spin the most silk in a day.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to sericultures was as strong as the silk threads themselves.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of sericultures lies in the delicate process of silk production.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of producing silk through the cultivation of silkworms.
meanings.sent1: Many people work in the sericultures to create silk products.
meanings.sent2: The sericultures in this town export their silk worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The sericultures held a fancy gala to celebrate their successful silk production.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, sericultures play a crucial role in providing luxurious silk.
meanings.sent5: The sericultures' market is bustling with activity as silk products are in high demand.
